pages.title: Security
pages.description: By using Contractus to close deals you guarantee the solvency your client's ability to pay.

pages.title: Guarantees
pages.description: You can conclude a contract without the possibility of unilateral termination.

pages.title: Checker
pages.description: You can appoint a checker for the result of the work. Only after the verification will the contractor receive his remuneration for the completed work.

pages.title: No commission
pages.description: You can conduct deals without commission of the service if you activate the Holder mode.
